languages.text: {n}Соломон касается железными пальцами щеки.{/n} "Лучше бы вы прострелили мне ногу... Ах да, перечить не дозволено. Тогда благодарю, что преподали урок — он пойдет на пользу такому наглецу, как я".

{n}Solomorne touches his cheek with his metal fingers.{/n} "I would have preferred a shot in the leg instead... Ah, that's right — I am not allowed to object. In that case, thank you for teaching me a lesson — this brazen detractor is sure to benefit from it."
languages.original_text: {n}Соломон касается железными пальцами щеки.{/n} "Лучше бы вы прострелили мне ногу... Ах да, перечить не дозволено. Тогда благодарю, что преподали урок — он пойдет на пользу такому наглецу, как я".

languages.text: {n}ソロモーンは金属の指で自分の頬に触れた。{/n}「できれば脚を撃ってほしかったのですが…ああ、そうでした。私は異議を唱えることすら許されていないんでしたね。ならば、教訓を授けてくれたことに感謝します。こんな無礼な口を叩いた者にも、きっと効果があるでしょう」
languages.original_text: {n}Solomorne touches his cheek with his metal fingers.{/n} "I would have preferred a shot in the leg instead... Ah, that's right — I am not allowed to object. In that case, thank you for teaching me a lesson — this brazen detractor is sure to benefit from it."

traits.locale_text: {n}ソロモーンは金属の指で自分の頬に触れた。{/n}「できれば脚を撃ってほしかったのですが…ああ、そうでした。私は異議を唱えることすら許されていないんでしたね。ならば、教訓を授けてくれたことに感謝します。こんな無礼な口を叩いた者にも、きっと効果があるでしょう」

languages.text: {n}Solomorne streicht sich mit seinen Metallfingern über die Wange.{/n} "Ein Schuss ins Bein wäre mir lieber gewesen ... Ach ja, richtig ... ich darf ja keine Einwände äußern. In dem Fall danke ich Euch für die Lektion – sie wird dieser unverschämten Lästerzunge sicher zum Vorteil gereichen."
languages.original_text: {n}Solomorne touches his cheek with his metal fingers.{/n} "I would have preferred a shot in the leg instead... Ah, that's right — I am not allowed to object. In that case, thank you for teaching me a lesson — this brazen detractor is sure to benefit from it."

traits.locale_text: {n}Solomorne streicht sich mit seinen Metallfingern über die Wange.{/n} "Ein Schuss ins Bein wäre mir lieber gewesen ... Ach ja, richtig ... ich darf ja keine Einwände äußern. In dem Fall danke ich Euch für die Lektion – sie wird dieser unverschämten Lästerzunge sicher zum Vorteil gereichen."

languages.text: {n}Solomorne porte sa main d'acier à sa joue.{/n} « J'aurais préféré une balle dans la jambe... Oh, c'est vrai : je ne suis pas en droit de contester. Fort bien. L'effronté détracteur que je suis vous remercie pour cette leçon. »
languages.original_text: {n}Solomorne touches his cheek with his metal fingers.{/n} "I would have preferred a shot in the leg instead... Ah, that's right — I am not allowed to object. In that case, thank you for teaching me a lesson — this brazen detractor is sure to benefit from it."

traits.locale_text: {n}Solomorne porte sa main d'acier à sa joue.{/n} « J'aurais préféré une balle dans la jambe... Oh, c'est vrai : je ne suis pas en droit de contester. Fort bien. L'effronté détracteur que je suis vous remercie pour cette leçon. »

languages.text: {n}Solomorne se palpa la mejilla con sus dedos metálicos.{/n} «Habría preferido un disparo en la pierna... Ah, es verdad; no se me permite protestar. En tal caso, gracias por esta lección que me ha dado: seguro que este detractor suyo la encuentra de mucha utilidad».
languages.original_text: {n}Solomorne touches his cheek with his metal fingers.{/n} "I would have preferred a shot in the leg instead... Ah, that's right — I am not allowed to object. In that case, thank you for teaching me a lesson — this brazen detractor is sure to benefit from it."

traits.locale_text: {n}Solomorne se palpa la mejilla con sus dedos metálicos.{/n} «Habría preferido un disparo en la pierna... Ah, es verdad; no se me permite protestar. En tal caso, gracias por esta lección que me ha dado: seguro que este detractor suyo la encuentra de mucha utilidad».

languages.text: {n}索罗蒙伸出金属手指，摸着自己的脸颊。{/n}“我宁愿腿上挨一枪……啊，对了，我无权反驳。既然如此，谢谢你给我上了一课。这个厚颜无耻的诋毁者肯定能学到有用的东西。”
languages.original_text: {n}Solomorne touches his cheek with his metal fingers.{/n} "I would have preferred a shot in the leg instead... Ah, that's right — I am not allowed to object. In that case, thank you for teaching me a lesson — this brazen detractor is sure to benefit from it."

traits.locale_text: {n}索罗蒙伸出金属手指，摸着自己的脸颊。{/n}“我宁愿腿上挨一枪……啊，对了，我无权反驳。既然如此，谢谢你给我上了一课。这个厚颜无耻的诋毁者肯定能学到有用的东西。”

languages.text: {n}Solomorne, metal parmaklarını yanağına götürüyor.{/n} "Keşke tokat atmak yerine beni bacağımdan vursaydınız. Doğru, itiraz etmeme müsaade yok. Bu durumda bana verdiğiniz ders için çok teşekkür ederim. Bu arsız muhalif, bunun faydasını kesinlikle görecektir."
languages.original_text: {n}Solomorne touches his cheek with his metal fingers.{/n} "I would have preferred a shot in the leg instead... Ah, that's right — I am not allowed to object. In that case, thank you for teaching me a lesson — this brazen detractor is sure to benefit from it."
